Description: Talk to Vidar inside the Statera HQ in Watterson City

Dialog.&8&lVidar: It is time we call on the power of &3Kyurem&r, [PLAYER]!
Go to their Shrine, there will be a Masterball waiting for you.

Objective: Head to Northrun and enter the Shrine for Kyurem

Dialog.[PLAYER]: &oIf there was ever a Shrine in Northrun... this was it.
&oSo in here, &3Kyurem&r should be in a deep slumber...
&oSeems like nobody has walked this path in a long time.
&oHmm, this is quite a hike, I should have brought something to drink.
&oThis looks more like it.
&oHmmm, This used to be a door I think...
&oSeems like it is frozen in place. Looks like I can climb through it though.
&oUh oh... a maze??!

Objective: Navigate through the maze of ice

Dialog.[PLAYER]: &oMy hands are freezing, If only I had some Hot chocolate...
&oHmm... This seems like another maze... But what is that?
&oLooks like this is a timed one. I have only 60 seconds to complete this...

GlobalHologram: This maze does not like visitors aimlessly
visitors will be kicked out after 60 seconds
So hurry to the exit and don't get caught!

NewDialog.&7&lMaze: Looks like you did not make it in time...
Hmm... I'll let you go this time...

NewDialog.[PLAYER]: &3&oKyurem&r &ois waiting for me, I better hurry.
&oHmm, looks like this is the final maze before I am at &3&oKyurem&r&o's Masterball.
&oThere is an inscription on the wall here...
&oNot everything is as it seems... What could that mean?
&oNow I get why no soul has ever tried to wake up &3&oKyurem&r&o!
&oI feel like I am close though. This bridge looks too majestic.

Dialog.[PLAYER]: &7Go &3Kyurem&r!
&oWhy is the Masterball not working?
&oDid I do something wrong?
&oUnless...
&oSophro has already been here! It's a set up!

Objective: Follow the path out of the Shrine (There's a hidden path to the right of the ice mazes)

Dialog.[PLAYER]: There's no way I'm letting them get away with this!

Objective: Battle the Pokémon around the Statera Leader

Dialog.[PLAYER]: It's starting to get dark... but there's still more Pokémon to battle!
My Pokémon are exhausted!
I'm exhausted!
Why are there so many Pokémon!
I've almost saved &8Vidar&r...

AutoBattleNpc.&e&lAstrid: You don't know what you're doing!

Dialog.&e&lAstrid: You're hiding behind your Champion, you're hiding behind your research, you're hiding behind your horde of brain-washed &lEMPLOYEES&r!
No one believes in your values, they are only greedy humans! Pokémon should not be controlled &8Vidar&r!
We've been over this before... Why must you repeat the past...

AutoBattleNpc.&d&lDanielle: [PLAYER] you've got a lot of nerve siding with the filth.
I'll make sure you see the error of your ways.
You've been the Hero far too often to turn out to be the Villain!
You don't understand what's going on at all do you?
&3Statera&r manipulated you into believing you were doing the right thing.
When in reality... you were fueling the flames of this War.
You will never win this War...

Dialog.&d&lDanielle: You may have beaten me but you will NEVER defeat the Swords of Justice and Kyurem!

Objective: Battle the Swords of Justice and Kyurem

Dialog.[PLAYER]: I- I don't understand! How could I be defeated?!
Dialog.&8&lVidar: We need to get out of here!
Dialog.&e&lAstrid: That's right! You've lost the War that you started! Now LEAVE!

Dialog.&d&lDanielle: It seems like one of the Swords of Justice wants to go with you...
It thinks it can show you the error of your ways... That what you've done can be repaired.
Like I said... you've been the Hero way too many times to be the Bad Guy, I hope to see you again [PLAYER], and we can talk this out.
Right now however, you've lost. You are lost.
Now Scram! Go back to &3Statera&r or face your punishment!

Objective: Head back to the Statera Headquarters

Dialog.&9&lOfficer Jen: You’re under arrest &8Vidar&r, for illegal research and contraband.
Your trapped and caged Pokémon have been taken into our custody for rehabilitation.
Not as if you cared, eh?
Dialog.&8&lVidar: This is not the last of me! &0Zekrom&r will return to me, and we will make Zeinova pure once more!

Hey [PLAYER]! H.A.P.P.Y. here! I'm calling you one final time, thank you for everything you've done with and for us. It was a pleasure meeting you! They will be shutting down my program now...
I'm here to reconnect you with your mentor, &cProfessor Hemlock&r! Have a wonderful life, [PLAYER]!
HA! Got you, [PLAYER]! Hehehehe! I just had to put a smile on your face one last time.
Dialog.&c&lProfessor Hemlock: Do you mind meeting me, at my lab? We have some things to discuss...

Objective: Visit Professor Hemlock at his lab

Dialog.&c&lProfessor Hemlock: What happened? I received a mass alert from &3Statera&r that all projects are shutting down?

SendMessage: &7&oYou explain everything that happened to Professor Hemlock

Dialog.&c&lProfessor Hemlock: So &3Statera's&r CEO, Vidar - is also the brother to Sophro's Leader, Astrid - and in the past the two of them created the region of Zeinova? How is that possible?
And my research for &3Statera&r was being used to control Pokémon rather than learning more how to understand Pokémon...
To attempt to suppress them, and gain control of the region with no outside influences. My research was being used for evil, and it's been in my hands quite clearly since we've arrived.
I should've caught on when &8Vidar&r requested a device to manipulate brain wavelengths, huh?
How could I be so blind...
I think... I think it's time for me to take a break, don't you [PLAYER]? It's been many years.
Your adventure here in Zeinova is still not over though, [PLAYER].
To better understand our companions, we have to be with our companions.
Get out there and catch 'em all! I'll be here waiting.
